article_title: Covered California extends enrollment to April 30
article_text: On Friday, Covered California extended its period to sign up for health insurance to April 30 for anyone who says they didn’t know about the new tax penalty for not having health coverage.

article_metadata.news-keywords: covered california, health insurance, enrollment, tax penalty, extends
